## Always First Command
**EVERY** RStudio session for this class should begin with the following code.
```{r results='hide', message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(NCStats)
```

----

## Load Data From Webpage

1. Load **Iris.csv** into an R data.frame called `dfiris`. 

```{r eval=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(NCStats)
setwd("C:/aaaWork/Web/GitHub/NCMTH107/modules/CEx")
dfiris <- read.csv("Iris.csv")
str(dfiris)
headtail(dfiris)
```
